mapper.select: SELECT reviewNo, bookmarkEnrollDate, content, rating, reviewCreatedAt FROM ( SELECT t.reviewNo, t.bookmarkEnrollDate, t.content, t.rating, t.reviewCreatedAt, ROWNUM rn FROM ( SELECT b.REVIEW_NO AS reviewNo, b.ENROLL_DATE AS bookmarkEnrollDate, r.CONTENT AS content, r.RATING AS rating, r.CREATED_AT AS reviewCreatedAt FROM TB_BOOKMARK b JOIN TB_REVIEW r ON r.REVIEW_NO = b.REVIEW_NO WHERE b.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND r.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY b.ENROLL_DATE DESC, b.REVIEW_NO DESC ) t WHERE ROWNUM <= (#{offset} + #{size}) ) WHERE rn > #{offset}
